        public static final boolean SECURE_SUPPORTED

    • Method Detail

      • newInstanceV17

        public static DummySurface newInstanceV17(boolean secure)
        Returns a newly created dummy surface. The surface must be released by calling release() when it's no longer required.

        Must only be called if Util.SDK_INT is 17 or higher.

        Parameters:
        secure - Whether a secure surface is required. Must only be requested if SECURE_SUPPORTED is true.

      • release

        public void release()
        Overrides:
        release in class Surface
